name: Unrooted
description:
Vampire survivors mixed with turn-based movement! Cut down the pesky Flowys chasing you, earn exp and pick upgrades that make you stronger! Or dont, just stay there and relax. Its up to you how you play, but can you find the 7th secret ending?

Best played on mobile phones, but Desktop is okay!
Made in Pico8 engine in 48hrs for the Global Game Jam!
